name: VWAP-Bollinger Mean-Reversion Mid-Cap Strategy
description: Daily mean-reversion system for U.S. mid-cap equities that buys extreme downside deviations (close < lower BB-20,2σ) confirmed by an upward 3-day VWAP slope and 25 % volume expansion. Positions sized at 2 % equity, stop 1.5 % below entry, target 3 % above, or exit on BB-midline touch or after 10 trading days.
